anathema: Permit the spread of the desert to fertile lands, refuse to fight your own battles, aid  Apep  or other omnicidal gods
edict: Bring chaos to society, murder those who stand in your way, defeat your foes with personal strength and cunning, kill  fiends
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Set (Lord of the Dark Desert)](/Deities.aspx?ID=641)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 6

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Bring chaos to society, murder those who stand in your way, defeat your foes with personal strength and cunning, kill [fiends](/Traits.aspx?ID=600)

**Anathema** Permit the spread of the desert to fertile lands, refuse to fight your own battles, aid [Apep](/Deities.aspx?ID=631) or other omnicidal gods

**Area of Concern**
Darkness, deserts, murder, storms

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy or unholy

**Divine Skill** [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40)

**Favored Weapon** [Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=365)

**Domains** [Darkness](/Domains.aspx?ID=69), [Death](/Domains.aspx?ID=70), [Dust](/Domains.aspx?ID=107), [Lightning](/Domains.aspx?ID=111)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=71)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Penumbral Shroud](/Spells.aspx?ID=2360)

- **3rd**
[Cup of Dust](/Spells.aspx?ID=2347)

- **6th**
[Disintegrate](/Spells.aspx?ID=1492)

</column>
name: Set (Lord of the Dark Desert)
